meanings.definition: A system of broadcasting or receiving multiple channels of information simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: Our new television has many multichannels for us to choose from.
meanings.sent2: The multichannels on the radio allow us to listen to different music genres.
meanings.sent3: I got lost in the multichannels of the TV guide and couldn't decide what to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a maze of multichannels, each thought leading to a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The multichannels of the internet provide a wealth of information at our fingertips.

meanings.definition: The ability to transmit or receive multiple channels of data at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The new router ensures fast multichannels for streaming videos without interruptions.
meanings.sent2: The satellite dish receives multichannels of data for our internet connection.
meanings.sent3: The computer scientist marveled at the multichannels of data flowing through the network.
meanings.sent4: His brain processed information like multichannels, absorbing data from various sources.
meanings.sent5: The multichannels of communication allow for seamless interaction between devices.
